metadata.title: CVE-2024-23950 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: Multiple improper array index validation vulnerabilities exist in thereadMSH functionality of libigl v2.5.0. A specially crafted .msh file canlead to an out-of-bounds write. An attacker can provide a malicious file totrigger this vulnerability.This vulnerability concerns the`igl::MshLoader::parse_element_field` function while handling an`binary`.msh` file.

criterions.comment: slic3r-prusa package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
